pages.title: Frost Ward
pages.text: Frost Ward is a runic power that imbues the wielder's weapon with the $(#38caff)$(l)essence of cold and frost$(). $(br2)It creates a ward that periodically fires movement impairing snowballs at nearby enemies.
Frost Ward is an ideal choice for those who prefer a more defensive playstyle, as it allows them to control the battlefield with ease.
